update formulation_nutrition_relation
formulation_id = #{formulationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nutrition_indicator_name = #{nutritionIndicatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nutrition_content_actual = #{nutritionContentActual,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
nutrition_content_ideal = #{nutritionContentIdeal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
nutrition_content_low_bound = #{nutritionContentLowBound,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
nutrition_content_high_bound = #{nutritionContentHighBound,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update formulation_nutrition_relation set formulation_id = #{formulationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nutrition_indicator_name = #{nutritionIndicatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nutrition_content_actual = #{nutritionContentActual,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, nutrition_content_ideal = #{nutritionContentIdeal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, nutrition_content_low_bound = #{nutritionContentLowBound,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, nutrition_content_high_bound = #{nutritionContentHighBound,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shadow_price = #{shadowPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
